National Account Sales Executive / Advanced Threat Intelligence at InfoArmor

Major business and government entities such as Target, Sony, JP Morgan Chase, the US Dept of Interior, the Federal Office of Personnel Management have all discovered that a robust investment in cyber defenses does not guarantee protection of your critical business assets from sophisticated, global threat actors. InfoArmor has developed and perfected a portfolio of ADVANCED THREAT INTELLIGENCE capabilities to help our Enterprise clients identify the presence and intent of cyber threats in the places where they plan, develop, and execute their criminal activities - global closed forums, invitation-only forums, the dark web, and other locations. Our intelligence is bolstered by a comprehensive network of threat operatives and proprietary data sources, and aggregated and delivered in a targeted and actionable format through our Vigilante ATI intelligence platform and security portal.

CyberSponse centralizes security operations and automates the flow of actions, efforts, task management, and control to resolve security incidents, mitigate threats, decrease confusion, and eliminate email inbox overflows.
Director Of Sales - Southwest US - Security Systems Division

IBM is a global provider of high-value, cost-effective next-generation security intelligence products. The company's flagship product, the QRadar Security Intelligence Platform, integrates previously disparate functions -- including SIEM, risk management, log management, network behavior analytics and security event management -- into a total security intelligence solution, making it the most intelligent, integrated and automated security intelligence solution available.

Lumension Security, Inc., a global leader in endpoint management and security, develops, integrates and markets security software solutions that help businesses protect their vital information and manage critical risk across network and endpoint assets.  Lumension enables more than 5,100 customers worldwide to achieve optimal security and IT success by delivering a proven and award-winning solution portfolio that includes Vulnerability Management, Endpoint Protection, Data Protection, Antivirus and Reporting and Compliance offerings.

Digital Media & Technology Consultant •	Responsible for startup of new business sales, revenue growth of $2,000,000, customer satisfaction, and customer retention goals. •	Develop strategic solutions for social media, software, and online technologies with customer’s existing marketing plans and CRM practices.•	Manage customer relationships with Martha Beck (Oprah’s Life Coach), Riding the Tiger Productions (Documentary on PBS this summer), and other personal brands.

January 2, 2017, Gerald managed David S directly

David is the consummate sales professional. He knows how to build great relationships with customers and understands his products like the back of his hand. He taught me more about our product than I could have ever learned on my own. He’s committed to the products he believes in but won’t push something if he doesn’t think it’s a fit for the customer - a rare (and excellent) trait in a sales person. If you’re looking for someone to build long term relationships with clients while hitting their sales targets, David is your man.
